GDevelop ist ein Open-Source-Spieleentwickler. Es kann von jedermann verwendet werden, um jede Art von 2D-Spielen zu erstellen.
Use JavaScript with the game engine: Use JavaScript with the game engine
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop wurde mit Liebe erstellt von
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: der Funktionen hinzugefügt, Fehler behoben, neue Beispiele geschickt, Tutorials geschrieben und der Community geholfen hat.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB ist ein ganz besonderes und einzigartiges Lebewesen. Sie ist "die erstaunlichste Katze auf dem Planeten" (http://lilbub.com)... und ihr Spiel wurde mit GDevelop erstellt!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Das Spiel ist ein Retro 8-Bit-Spiel, mit schönen Künsten und Soundtrack, die zwischen Platformers Ebenen, mit versteckten Geheimnissen, und Shooter-Levels mit Bossen, mehrere Feinde und Boni abwechselt.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights ist ein actionreiches Jet-Combat Spiel, indem Sie Ihren Weg durch Massen, technologisch unterlegener, Gegner sprengen, ausweichen und durchschneiden müssen.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: Wenn Ihre intergalaktische Interventions-Mission fortschreitet, wird sich Ihr adaptiver Hyper-Jet zu etwas Stärkerem und Verrückterem entwickeln, indem Sie einige der Hunderten von Gegenständen sammeln, die im Spiel verfügbar sind.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Stellen Sie sich vor und veröffentlichen Sie Ihre Spiele mit GDevelop. Mit Tutorials und Beispielen.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Unterstützen Sie GDevelops Open Source HTML5 Spielentwicklungswerkzeug
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop ist ein Open-Source-Projekt (auch diese Website): Jeder kann dazu beitragen und die Software verbessern!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Es gibt mehrere Möglichkeiten, wie Sie zu GDevelop beitragen können, abhängig von Ihrer Zeit, Ihren Fähigkeiten und Ihren Interessen.
Help to translate GDevelop: Hilfe bei der Übersetzung von GDevelop
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop und die Website können in Ihre Sprache übersetzt werden! Übersetzungen werden auf einer Website erstellt, auf der sich jeder einbringen kann.
Help us by translating GDevelop!: Helfen Sie uns bei der Übersetzung von GDevelop!
Help to develop GDevelop: Helfe dabei GDevelop weiter zu entwickeln
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Es ist sehr einfach den Quelltext von GDevelop zu bekommen und zu verändern!
Get involved in the community: Engagieren Sie sich in der Gemeinschaft
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Das Forum und der Discord Chat sind die Orte um Hilfe zu bekommen und anderen GDevelop Benutzern zu geben!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Folgen Sie GDevelop auf Facebook und Twitter:
Write tutorials, record videos: Schreiben Sie Tutorien und nehmen Sie Videos auf
For most beginners and even advanced use: Für die meisten Anfänger und auch Fortgeschrittene sind Tutorials und Hilfe-Seite die wertvollsten Ressourcen schnell tolle Spiele zu erstellen. Im wiki können Sie Tutorials schreiben oder bestehende zu verbessern.
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Laden Sie GDevelop herunter oder versuchen Sie es online - erstellen Sie Spiele ohne Programmierkenntnisse
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop ist kostenlos und eignet sich für Profit oder Non-Profit-Spiel machen.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop läuft unter Windows, macOS und den neuesten Linux-Distributionen. Sie können es auch online mit Chrome, Firefox oder einem anderen aktuellen Webbrowser ausprobieren.
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system. Type `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` in a terminal or install it from your package manager.
To create your first game, start by read: Um Ihr erstes Spiel zu erstellen, lesen Sie zuerst ein Tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop ist ein Open-Source-Projekt. Sie können sich in der Community beteiligen um es zu verbessern!
Learn how to contribute: Erfahren Sie, wie Sie uns unterstützen können
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: GDevelop 4 kann immer noch heruntergeladen werden. Allerdings wird GDevelop 5 für jeden neuen Benutzer empfohlen, weil GDevelop 4 nicht mehr aktualisiert wird! Da in der Zukunft keine Unterstützung für GDevelop 4 bereitgestellt wird, empfehlen wir jedem GDevelop 4 Benutzer ein Upgrade auf GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Selbst wenn GDevelop 4 native Spiele unterstützt, empfehlen wir die Umstellung auf GDevelop 5 und HTML5 Spiele, die besser unterstützt werden. Native Spiele werden später zu GDevelop 5 hinzugefügt.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop für die Bildung - Lehrnen Sie die Spieleentwicklung
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: GDevelop ist im Klassenzimmer eine perfekte Gelegenheit den Schülern das Programmieren und die Spielentwicklung beizubringen. Außerdem können die Schüler ihre Kreativität frei in Lauf lassen.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop wurde bereits in Klassenzimmern und Online-Kursen, mit digitalen Medien Studenten und Kindern der ersten Klasse verwendet!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Bitte senden Sie uns Ihre Fotos und Tweets, falls Sie GDevelop für einen Kurs verwenden!
Make your own Facebook Instant Games wit: Erstellen Sie Ihre eigenen Facebook Instant Games mit GDevelop - Veröffentlichen Sie Ihre Spiele auf dem Messenger
Make games for Facebook Messenger: Erstellen Sie Spiele für den Facebook Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Mit GDevelop können Sie Ihr Spiel als ein Facebook Instant Game in 2 Klicks exportieren.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Erstellen Sie Ihr Programm auf Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Als erstes sollten Sie sicherstellen, dass Sie ein Konto bei **Facebook Developers** haben. Erstellen Sie anschließend ein Programm und konfigurieren Sie es so, dass "Spiele" als Kategorie ausgewählt und Instant Games in Ihren Produkten aktiviert ist:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Öffnen Sie GDevelop und exportieren Sie Ihr Spiel für Facebook Instant Games
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Facebook Instant Games**, click on Export and wait a few seconds.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Gehen Sie zurück zu Ihrer Spielseite auf Facebook Developers, wählen Sie Web-Hosting im Menü und laden Sie die Dateien hoch, die von GDevelop exportiert wurden.
You can also add testers to let your fri: Sie können ebenfalls Tester hinzufügen, damit Ihre Freunde Ihr Spiel ausprobieren können.
More about uploading your game: Mehr Informationen zum Hochladen Ihres Spiels
4) Try your game on Messenger: 4) Versuchen Sie Ihr Spiel auf Messenger
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Now, get your phone and **open messenger**. Open a conversation, choose Games and click on the icon of your game to start playing to it!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Use Instant Games features and publish your game!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop gave you access to Instant Games specific features, like the name of the player, to better integrate your game in Messenger conversations.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: When your game is ready, submit it for review by Facebook so that it becomes **available worldwide**!
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Features of GDevelop - create any kind of games without coding
GDevelop is bundled with dozens of featu: GDevelop is bundled with dozens of features to imagine and create any kind of games.
Deploy your game everywhere: Veröffentliche dein Spiel wo es dir gefällt
One click export to [Facebook Instant Ga: One click export to [Facebook Instant Games](/facebook-instant-games), to play on Messenger.
Export your game [for the web](http://wi: Export your game [for the web](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/web) in one click
Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap: Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap Build or Cordova](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/android_and_ios_with_cordova))
Publish your game on Kongregate, Itch.io: Veröffentliche dein Spiel bei Kongregate, Itch.io oder auf anderen Spiele-Websites!
Export as a stand-alone executable game: Export as a stand-alone executable game for Windows, macOS and Linux
Learn how to publish your game: Learn how to publish your game
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Create explosions, fire and impressive effects with **Particle Emitters**
Draw custom shapes on screen with Shape: Draw custom shapes on screen with Shape Painters
Read the documentation for all objects: Read the documentation for all objects
Add behaviors to your game objects: Add behaviors to your game objects
Add realistic behavior to your objects: Add realistic behavior to your objects
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Have your objects move and avoiding obstacles
quickly make your objects draggable with: quickly make your objects draggable with mouse/touch
And more, to automate current tasks and: Und vieles mehr, um aktuelle Aufgabe und Verhaltensweisen mit ein paar Klicks zu automatisieren!
Read the documentation for all behaviors: Read the documentation for all behaviors
The scene editor lets you visually edit: Der Szenen-Editor lässt Sie Ihre Level visuell bearbeiten
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Add interfaces and create parallax effects
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Erstellen Sie Ihre Level dynamisch mit externen Layouts
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: a powerful pixel art and sprite editor
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Inspect the content of your game and make dynamic changes while previewing your game
[monitor the resource expensive spots](h: [monitor the resource expensive spots](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/interface/debugger/profile-your-game) in your game
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Das Erstellen von Desktop und Mobilgerät-fähigen Spielen
Save player data in browser/local storag: Save player data in browser/local storage
Full support for sound effects and music: Volle Unterstützung für Soundeffekte und Musik
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Erstelle anspruchsvolle Spiele mit fortgeschrittenen Features
Communicate with external websites using: Kommuniziere mit externen Websites mithilfe von HTTP-Anfragen
Use advanced events: loops, for-each and: Use advanced events: loops, for-each and even functions
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures and even JSON support
You can even [use JavaScript to code](/j: You can even [use JavaScript to code](/javascript-game-engine) some parts of your game!
All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: All editors of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: The interface of GDevelop is made of intuitive editors to design your own games from scratch.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger in your game in 90 seconds
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Design your own levels with the scene editor: you can choose objects, put them on the scene, adjust their position and size. You can entirely design your levels with the scene editor. If you want to create complex levels or interfaces, the external layouts allow you to create parts of a level and then reuse them in other scenes.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Loslegen in zwei Minuten: Testen Sie GDevelop in Ihrem Browser
Imagining and creating the rule of your: Imagining and creating the rule of your game does not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: All conditions and actions are available in a list so you can easily discover and find what you want to make the rules of your game.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Learn more about events in the tutorials
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Everything that is displayed on the screen of your game is an object. Most objects are called sprites: they are composed of animations and can be used for any animated element. For example, your player, enemies or bonuses to pick.
Other object are also available to creat: Other object are also available to create interfaces or add effects to your game: texts, particles, tiled sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Discover all the objects available in GDevelop
All the images and audio files used in y: All the images and audio files used in your game are listed in the Resources Editor. It's a simple way to manage your game assets.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel.
Learn everything about the editors in th: Learn everything about the editors in the documentation
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Examples of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples an: GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: These are the examples bundled with GDevelop. Curious? You can open and try them directly from your browser. GDevelop is fast to start and you'll be playing with the examples in seconds.
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop or get help about a specific feature: the wiki has tutorials for beginners and a complete documentation for the software.
Showcase of the games created with GDeve: Showcase of the games created with GDevelop
Here are a few games created with GDevel: Here are a few games created with GDevelop. The next one should be yours!
We'll love to know about your game and a: We'll love to know about your game and add it here. Make sure you have beautiful screenshots ready and that the game is high quality :)
Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Einzigartige Genschichtenerzählung mit Irreführungen und Überraschungen
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Item Inventory: collect items to be used strategically throughout the game
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Tape Deck feature that allows you to select your favorite music from the game
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Ability to revisit and replay levels to further your progress and unlock achievements
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Spiele erstellen ohne Programmierung - Open-Source HTML5 und systemeigene Spieleentwicklungssoftware
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop game maker software - create video games without coding
Make your own games with GDevelop: Mache deine eigenen Spiele mit GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game creator designed to be used by everyone - no programming skills required.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Was GDevelop einzigartig und so einfach zu bedienen macht, sind die Ereignisse. Ereignisse sind eine leistungsstarke Möglichkeit, die Logik Ihres Spiels auszudrücken, ohne eine Programmiersprache zu lernen.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If a bomb touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game in one click: Exportiere dein Spiele in einem Klick
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Erstellen Sie Spiele für iOS, Android, Windows, macOS und Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, Tablet oder Handy: GDevelop-Spiele laufen überall
Express your ideas without being blocked: Express your ideas without being blocked: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) as never been as easy as assembling your ideas with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Tutorien sowie Dokumentationen für GDevelop gibt es in der Wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
Read more about Lil BUB's game: Read more about Lil BUB's game
